page.title: 06Transport in Knypersley.
page.content: As Knypersley is relatively small its transport facilitiesare limited.The only public transport system is a bus route via Knypersley to Hanley and Newcastle-under-Lyme. The residential estate surrounding the High School has a regular two hourly bus service on a local circular route.A single bus service by the small local Stoniers Company runs from this estate to Hanley.It is inconvenient due its infrequency.The alternative service requires users to travel into Knypersley before they may join the service to reach Hanley. The Council owned estate has a regular half-hourly service to Biddulph and Hanley.This service links with others to Congleton. Charges are generally regarded as reasonable with concessions to the eldery and children at two/thirds fare.
